# Glow Salon & Spa

> Where beauty meets passion, and every client leaves glowing.

Glow Salon & Spa is a full-service hair and nail salon located in the Village of West Clay in Carmel, Indiana. Founded in 2013, we serve clients across Carmel, Westfield, Fishers, and the greater Indianapolis area. We specialize in hair styling, color, nail services, makeup, and bridal packages — including on-site wedding hair and makeup.
